text: Katahdin Falls is the tallest waterfall in Maine, in the United States, dropping up to 800 vertical feet (244 m) with a main drop of . It is located in Baxter State Park in Piscataquis County opposite of Witherlie Ravine, on Mount Katahdin on a tributary of Katahdin Stream. ==Notes== Category:Waterfalls of Maine Category:Landforms of Piscataquis County, Maine Category:Tiered waterfalls
title: Katahdin Falls
